message.content:
cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.CL 

The paper proposes a deep learning approach for efficient video compression and fast retrieval of video images in the context of endoscopy. This involves addressing data variability and improving accuracy of image retrieval. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is computer vision (cs.CV). The paper also deals with multi-modality and view-point changes, which suggests it could also belong to multimedia (cs.MM). Information retrieval (cs.IR) is another possible sub-category, as the paper discusses the need for tools to capture information from endoscopy videos for clinical reporting. Machine learning (cs.LG) and natural language processing (cs.CL) are also possible sub-categories, as the paper proposes the use of autoencoders and Siamese networks.
